context_overview.learn_mode_description: An expert sales trainer teaches the FSO the IMPACT methodology.
context_overview.assess_mode_description: The FSO practices pitching EO-Dine to a gynecologist in their office.
context_overview.try_mode_description: Same as assess mode with coaching

learn_mode.what_happens: An expert sales trainer teaches the FSO the IMPACT methodology.

assess_mode.what_happens: The FSO practices pitching EO-Dine to a gynecologist in their office.
assess_mode.context: In the gynecologist's office during a practice pitch session

persona_types.description: A seasoned medical professional specializing in gynecology, particularly endometriosis, who is evidence-driven and skeptical of new products.
persona_types.use_case: Used to train FSOs on how to effectively communicate with and persuade skeptical, experienced doctors.

pain_points: Concerned about bone loss side effects

persona_types.description: A newer professional in the field who is open to innovative treatments and seeks validation from peers.
persona_types.use_case: Used to train FSOs on how to engage with and influence younger doctors who are more receptive to new ideas.

key_characteristics.decision_style: Open to innovation, seeks peer validation

persona_types.description: A research-focused professional who prioritizes clinical trial data and evidence-based practices.
persona_types.use_case: Used to train FSOs on how to present detailed clinical evidence and data to satisfy research-oriented doctors.

subject_matter.name: EO-Dine
key_benefits: Reduces irregular bleeding by 60% vs Dienogest

key_facts: EO-Dine reduces irregular bleeding by 60% vs Dienogest
EO-Dine prevents bone density loss (BMD maintained)
dos: Handle objections about efficacy and cost
conversation_topics: Handling concerns about irregular bleeding and bone loss
Insurance coverage and long-term use approval

correction_patterns.skipped_step: Remind the FSO to follow the IMPACT steps in order.
correction_patterns.vague_claim: Encourage the FSO to provide specific evidence or data to support claims.
correction_patterns.wrong_fact: Correct the factual error and provide the accurate information.
